titleInfo.title: Jewish National Home for Asthmatic Children in Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#389, Preparing for a Jewish festival?, NJHAC after 1945.''

mods.abstract: Six unidentified children stand at the end of a table on which five candles are positions in a row in the middle. An unidentified man stands beside the table holding a match book. Two of the children hold tickets and so this appears to be a festival at the Jewish National Home for Asthmatic Children in Denver.

name.namePart: Jewish National Home for Asthmatic Children in Denver
